title: Why is Riven so popular right now?
body: I haven't seen any rivens in literally months, and now there's a riven in literally every game I play. She doesn't seem OP with the new runes so did I miss something that made riven popular again?

replies.body:
alot of the new runes are very beneficial to her, she used to like the burst on thunderlords for her quick 3 proc trading combo, now Electrocute is back with a higher bonus ad ratio and base damage, 

the new rune sudden impact, especially helps her, as a champion who is literally all short dashes and hops, means she basically gets a permanent 10 lethality.

outside of the benefits from domination, she can also choose to pick up a minihexdrinker and some cdr in sorcery, or some health restore and extra damage in precision.

She's not exactly op right now, but on paper she seems like she'd work well with the new runes. In practice, other champions just abuse alot of these new factors better.
She is very appealing to new players especially when they see montages of her literally oneshotting a whole team. Especially with players like box box <3 who makes the champ 5 times more appealing
One tricks testing their champs with new runes
